title: How to customize your news feed in Google News and Google Discover
content:
On Android, there are a couple of ways of accessing Google News, and there are a few ways to customize your Google News and Google Discover feed. This guide will take you through how to block certain sources, tell Google what you’re interested in, and save the stories you really like.

more…

The post How to customize your news feed in Google News and Google Discover appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In order to see the content you like, you need to customize Google News and Google discover. Our guide shows you how to do that.
